resources.string: Do you really want to delete this Threema Web session?
To connect, open https://web.threema.ch in the browser of your PC and tap the button below to scan the code.

Threema Web allows you to chat from your PC or notebook while giving you full access to all your contacts, media and chats, even past conversations.

All communication between phone and PC is fully end-to-end encrypted and uses a direct connection if both phone and PC are on the same network.

Please note: Threema Web may cause some additional battery drain while it is active. You can enable or disable it at any time.
Please scan the QR code displayed on the PC.
Your app does not support this version of Threema Web. Please update Threema to the latest version.
Your app does not support this version of Threema Web. Please ask the administrator of your Threema Web instance to upgrade to the latest version.
Your app does not support this version of Threema Web. Please use a newer version of Threema Web.
The session of the QR code you scanned already exists. Please reload Threema Web in your web browser and try again.
Would you like to start this Threema Web session now?
Server is not approved by the administrator.
Are you sure that you want to stop and remove all Threema Web sessions?
Start this tool to debug problems with setting up a Threema Web connection
Tap on «Start» to launch the test.
Done. If you experience problems with Threema Web connection build-up, please send this log to Threema support.
